alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:10PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla and south central Walla Walla Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 910 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Adams, or 14 miles northeast of Pendleton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walla Walla, Milton-Freewater, Athena, Weston, Adams, Helix, Umapine and northern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
